description:
We are VoxRay Games, a small game studio working on a raytraced voxel game with FPS/RPG/Survival elements! Check out early visuals on https://twitter.com/voxraygames or https://store.steampowered.com/app/2283580/Voxlands/ We are looking for a Lead Designer that can help us bring our game worlds to maximum fun and quality.
Details: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15G_3sXW-qVlMEBcs1QVOp_oMMkZSDBC0wC-UNL82xC8/edit#heading=h.5rynx1mwgg3y
